FindMySiblingStart.text: Hey, have you seen my $FindMySibling.YoungerSibling.SiblingTitle$? $FindMySibling.YoungerSibling.GenderPronounOwning$ name is $FindMySibling.YoungerSibling.FirstName$.

SiblingSpeechSpawnText.text: Hi, I am $MyFirstName$! Nice to meet you!

SiblingSpeech.text: Hi, I am $MyFirstName$! Were you looking for me?

FindMySiblingEnd.text: Thank you for finding my $FindMySibling.YoungerSibling.SiblingTitle$! Here have this $FindMySibling.QuestItem1$.
